member.name: T:IcVibracoes.DataContracts.RigidBody.RigidBodyRequest
member.summary: It contains the request content to Rigid Body operation.

member.name: P:IcVibracoes.DataContracts.RigidBody.RigidBodyRequest.DampingRatios
member.summary: List of damping ratio of system. For each value in the list, it is made a new analysis. Damping ratio represents the relation between damping by critical damping. If it is equals to zero, the vibration is harmonic. If it is greater than zero and less than 1, the vibration is underdamped. If it is equals to one, the vibration is critical damped. If it is greater than 1, the vibration is overdamped. Unit: Dimensionless.

member.name: P:IcVibracoes.DataContracts.RigidBody.RigidBodyRequest.Force
member.summary: The force applied in the main object. Unit: N (Newton)

member.summary: It contains the response content of Rigid Body operation.

member.summary: It contains the 'data' content of RigidBody response operation.
